alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 21 at 12:52PM PST until January 22 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. Strongest in the hills. * WHERE...San Gabriel Valley. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Roadways may be affected by gusty cross winds. This includes the 10, 57, 60, 210, 605, and 710 freeways.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley
